:py:mod:`sns_toolbox.renderer`
==============================

.. py:module:: sns_toolbox.renderer

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Take in a network, and render its structure using the package 'graphviz'.

---------------

.. py:data:: graphviz_available
   :annotation: = False
